subject: AI
title: Rate Limiting and Abuse
description: A quick win: understand Rate Limiting and Abuse.

hook.text: One bored person with a script can turn your â€œhelpful agentâ€ into a cost fountain overnight.

buildup.text: Rate limits are your seatbelt: they protect cost, latency, and availability when things go weird.

discovery.text: Rate-limit by user + IP + action. Make expensive tools stricter than cheap ones, and add per-day budgets for paid features.

twist.text: Retries can multiply cost and load. Without caps, a single failure turns into a storm.

climax.text: Pair rate limits with good UX: clear errors, backoff, and an escalation path instead of endless retries.

quiz.question: What does rate limiting protect against?
